DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the average risk for thyroid irradiation for any type of paediatric cardiac catheterization, based on the cummulative at-risk dose of 100 mSv, adjusted to the measured thyroid volume and to the patient's age.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Thyroid Exposure to Radiation Doses During Paediatric Cardiac Catheterisations Performed for Diagnosis or the Treatment of Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion of any patient (< 18 yearold) with congenital heart disease undergoing one or more cardiac catheterization Exclusion of patients with any type of thyroid dissease
